name: Captain Holly
sentences: This chamber has a lower occurence of the target flora.
Our Botanist thinks the specimen have an optimal pressure range.
The more intriguing discovery is with the local fauna:
The fish share the same bioluminescent properties.
This appears to be the deepest this cave formation goes.
We'll be able to contact the R.V. Seagazer once-
*Monstrous groans and an explosion cut off the recording*
